div.p: Analysis of the cellular uptake of free QD655 into living duct cells. ( a) Representative 2P-luminescence intensity images and corresponding 2P-FLIM images of duct cells recorded in the green (BP 514/44) and red (BP 700/75) detection channels at distinct time points. The cells were treated for 120 min with physiological saline containing 5â€‰nm QD655. ( b) Luminescence decay curves extracted from intracellular regions of interest from 2P-FLIM images recorded in the green detection channel. ( c) Luminescence decay curves extracted from extracellular regions of interest from 2P-FLIM images recorded in the red detection channel.
